title: Google\Cloud\Dataplex\V1\StorageFormat\CsvOptions
name: CsvOptions
description:
Describes CSV and similar semi-structured data formats.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataplex.v1.StorageFormat.CsvOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.encoding
params.description: Optional. The character encoding of the data. Accepts "US-ASCII", "UTF-8", and "ISO-8859-1". Defaults to UTF-8 if unspecified.

params.name: data.header_rows
params.description: Optional. The number of rows to interpret as header rows that should be skipped when reading data rows. Defaults to 0.

params.name: data.delimiter
params.description: Optional. The delimiter used to separate values. Defaults to ','.

params.name: data.quote
params.description: Optional. The character used to quote column values. Accepts '"' and '''. Defaults to '"' if unspecified.
